info.title: TiOS API
info.description: Welcolme to TiOS Platfor API documentation.

get.summary: Get list of dashboards for the web app
Get panels information from a particular dashboard

get.description: Returns sensor data (last 20 entries recorded in DB). This data gets collected from a datapoint (for example, a temperature sensor) connected to a datasource (for example, a Vemetris Gateway)
Returns sensor data (last entry recorded in DB). This data gets collected from a datapoint (for example, a temperature sensor) connected to a datasource (for example, a Vemetris Gateway)

get.summary: Get Datasources related to a particular project
get.description: Returns List of datasources from a project

get.summary: Get Active Datasources related to a particular project
get.description: Returns List of active datasources from a project

get.summary: Get count of  Datasources related to a particular project
get.description: Returns count of active datasources from a project

get.summary: Get list of  Datapoints of a parrticular Datasource
get.description: Returns list of  Datapoints of a parrticular Datasource

get.summary: Get Organization information by Project ID
get.description: Returns Organization data by Project ID
Returns list of users by Project ID
Returns Users count by project id
Returns Dashboards count by project id
Returns Dashboards data by project id

get.summary: Get spaces count information by project
get.description: Returns sspaces count information by project
